ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras, 1/3" SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera, 425TV line. You Can Virtually Hide it Anywhere. Dimension: 35.5mm/35.5mm. Super Low 0.5Lux Works Great In Low Light.
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime, 2TB HDD, 960×480 & 30FPS recording, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, HI 3521 CPU.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support
ProductInfo.Name: GW High-End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 8 Channel 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real Time Recording, 6 SONY CCD Small Pinhole Camera, iPhone Android Viewable
